title: A Voyage round Great Britain; with short views of Aberdeen, Balmoral, ... Fécamp, Havre and Paris
author: Hargreaves, Thomas
snippet: In North Castle Street may be seen the house—No. 39—occupied by Sir Walter Scott during themost interesting period of his life, from 1800 to1826. In the more western districts of Edinburghsome very fine streets are embraced, among othersMelville Street, Chester Street, Manor Place, Palmerston Place, Lansdowne and Grosvenor Places, orCrescents. St. Mary's Cathedral is at the end ofMelville Street.
